definition: a thoroughfare (usually including sidewalks) that is lined with buildings
details:
noun
- a thoroughfare (usually including sidewalks) that is lined with buildings
= example: a thoroughfare (usually including sidewalks) that is lined with buildings
- the part of a thoroughfare between the sidewalks
- people living or working on the same street
= example: people living or working on the same street
- a situation offering opportunities
= example: a situation offering opportunities
- the streets of a city viewed as a depressed environment in which there is poverty and crime and prostitution and dereliction
= example: the streets of a city viewed as a depressed environment in which there is poverty and crime and prostitution and dereliction
